price: ‘নিশ্চয় মই তোমালোকৰ ওপৰত এটা মহা দিৱসৰ শাস্তিৰ আশংকা কৰি আছোঁ’।
arabic: إِنِّيٓ أَخَافُ عَلَيۡكُمۡ عَذَابَ يَوۡمٍ عَظِيمٖ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: innī akhāfu ʿalaykum ʿadhāba yawmin ʿaẓīmin
